lead_paragraph: Chelsea's interim manager Guus Hiddink spoke up for the FA Cup as "the temple of football" after his side crushed a virtually unrecognisable Manchester City 5-1 to reach the quarter-finals on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Hiddink Defends FA Cup After Chelsea Thrash Man City
headline.main: Hiddink Defends FA Cup After Chelsea Thrash Man City

snippet: Chelsea's interim manager Guus Hiddink spoke up for the FA Cup as "the temple of football" after his side crushed a virtually unrecognisable Manchester City 5-1 to reach the quarter-finals on Sunday....
